  • City: MIAMI

  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN MIAMI, FLORIDA, CARGO WAS BEING INSPECTED FOR AIR MOVEMENT TO NICARAGUA. ONE BOX WAS FOUND TO HAVE SIGNS OF MARKS AND LABELS HAVING PREVIOUSLY BEEN CUT OFF THE PACKAGE. INNER CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALED LITHIUM BATTERY PACKS FOR HP LAPTOPS INSIDE THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023081828
item.description:
Report X-2023081828

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found torn and wet in damage area. Box and contents were placed inside red hazmat tote with hazmat bag and taken to hazmat cage. DescribePack: The cap on one of the bottles was not secured properly and caused the contents to leak out into package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box and contents were placed inside red hazmat tote with hazmat bag and taken to hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023081825
item.description:
Report X-2023081825

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: HOMESTEAD
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO QA, UPON INSPECTION LOOSE CAP. NOT EN OUGH PACKING MATERIAL USED. A LOT OF NEGATIVE SPACE ALLOWING CONTENTS TO SHIFT ON IMPACT. BOTTLE CAP NOT SECURED AND NOT PACKED WELL ENOUGH TO PREVENT MOVEMENT UPON IMPACT. DescribePack: Loose Cap on one bottle DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PUT INSIDE HAZMAT TOTE AND STORED IN HAZMAT CAG

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The cap was loose on the jug in the box, causing contents to leak out. The seal on the jug's spout, under the cap did not work. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright in a hazbag lined tote.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat box was found wet in the unload and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The 20 liter bladder bag in the box had a small puncture on it's side, causing contents to leak out. There were no punctures in the outer box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081658
item.description:
Report X-2023081658

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Plastic pail was found next to the HazMat Cage empty. It was brought inside and found to have a crack on its baseline. DescribePack: The plastic pail was empty and had a 3-inch crack running along its bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was moved into the HazMat Cage. An unknown person had already set it next to the HazMat Cage entrance.

item.title: Report X-2023081657
item.description:
Report X-2023081657

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was loaded to a van when it was discovered wet and it was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection. DescribePack: All 4 plastic bottles of SafeClean Equipment Hygiene Solution leaked from loose caps. Caps were not secured and only slotted partitions were used as inner packaging materials. The box also got wet with machinery oil from another damaged package that leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon discovery the wet package was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment. No release was found.

item.title: Report X-2023081647
item.description:
Report X-2023081647

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-20
  • City: WEST PALM BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS BEING LOADED TO THE TRUCK WHEN THEY REALIZE THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING. THEY PLACE THE ITEM INSIDE OF THE HAZMAT BIN DescribePack: UNPON INSPECTION OF THE DAMAGE, THE CAP AND THE SEAL WAS OFF OF THE BOTTLE WHICH IS WHAT CAUSED THE LEAKAGE INSIDE AND OUT OF THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG PLACED IN THE HAZMAT AREA

item.title: Report X-2023081589
item.description:
Report X-2023081589

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-19
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 1 can of Fleetrite A/C FLush solvent 1-gallon had small dents on sides & near lid along with loose lid resulted to leakage. DescribePack: Can had small dents on sides & near lid along with loose lid resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined.

item.title: Report X-2023081582
item.description:
Report X-2023081582

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: PORT SAINT LUCIE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Received leaking 5 gallon steel pail of ZEP brake wash on the unload side leaking from a dented, bent lid. The pail was contained in a hazmat bag and pail and brought to the QA cage for processing, DescribePack: The lid failed due to be dented somehow during transportation. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The metal pail was placed into a hazmat bag and pail to prevent leakage from going on to any packages nearby or equipment.

item.title: Report X-2023081537
item.description:
Report X-2023081537

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: WEST PALM BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was being unloaded from preload sort when a package handler quickly identified the damaged hazmat and brought it to the sort managers attention. After then it was brought to QA for inspection and damage report. DescribePack: Due to the leakage from the loose caps the package sustained heavy damage to the top of the box/packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After inspection caps were retightened and tested to ensure that they will contain the corrosive liquid and for future PGH disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023081538
item.description:
Report X-2023081538

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a plastic bag containing 1 bottle of Athena Reset 1-gallon had loose lid resulted to leakage. Outer packaging doesn't display any hazmat markings but the bottle itself displays a Oxidizer & Corrosive diamond. Package was shipped as a normal package & not as hazmat. DescribePack: Bottle had loose lid resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081528
item.description:
Report X-2023081528

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The 5 gal metal pail of Signatory Products 7666 â€“ MRC-ALT arrived to the station heavily dented and leaking. It was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection. DescribePack: It was discovered the it also had a small punctured on the side causing it to leak. The shipper did not use a shipping box or inner packing materials. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon arrival the metal pail was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment. No release was found.

item.description:

  • City: ORLANDO

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 1.5 POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SEAFOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. OUTER BOX IS PREPRINTED RUSH, PERISHABLE AND HAS ORIENTATION ARROWS. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM FLORIDA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 24390W, AMAZON MFN, 333 108TH AVE. NE, BELLEVUE WA 98004.

item.title: Report X-2023081201
item.description:
Report X-2023081201

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS FOUND WET/DAMAGED AND PLACED IN TOTE FOR QA. DescribePack: INSPECTION FOUND A LOOSE CAP ON A BOTTLE OF RAPICIDE PA PART B THAT ALLOWED LEAKAGE WHEN PACKAGE MOVED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: CAP TIGHTENED; PACKAGE REMOVED FROM AREA OF OTHER PACKAGES.

item.title: Report I-2023090084
item.description:
Report I-2023090084

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-23T00:30:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-12-07
  • City: Tampa
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNIVAR SOLUTIONS USA INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: No Ieakage was noticed at time of pick up, but once unloading at facility was started it was found that 1-2 gallons had leaked onto pallet and trailer floor. There was a small crease about 3/4 ways down the drum that we expect opened up in transit. The location of damage on the drum was interfacing on the pallet preventing visual inspection.
